chart_description: This chart displays the rate of softirqs (software interrupts) processed by the system per second, broken down by type of interrupt.

dimension_descriptions.BLOCK: The number of softirqs caused by blocked I/O operations per second.
dimension_descriptions.NET_RX: The number of softirqs caused by incoming network traffic per second.
dimension_descriptions.NET_TX: The number of softirqs caused by outgoing network traffic per second.
dimension_descriptions.RCU: The number of softirqs caused by read-copy-update (RCU) synchronization per second.
dimension_descriptions.SCHED: The number of softirqs caused by task scheduler per second.
dimension_descriptions.TASKLET: The number of softirqs caused by tasklets (a way of handling bottom-halves of interrupts) per second.
dimension_descriptions.TIMER: The number of softirqs caused by timers per second.
